display_name: Filtered: Obstructive apnea (all desats) Hypopnea (4% desat) Index
description: Obstructive Apnea Hypopnea Index  {[(Total number of obstructive apneas) + (Total number of hypopneas associated with >= 4% desat)] / (hours of sleep)}
calculations: 60*(hrembp4 +hrop4 + hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + oarbp +oarop + oanbp + oanop ) / slpprdp
